authors: Jan-Henk Edens, Bennie Schutten, Raymon Boer, Eddie Lutjes

deprecation.message: Please make sure you are running Clickker V2 before migrating!

description:
Een client voor het uitvragen en afhandelen van anvragen richting Clickker.
Clickker is de API voor connectivity met Exact Globe.
releaseNotes:
v1.2.6.2
    - Added DebtorCreditorAccount to Account model
v1.2.6.1
    - Possibility to search a setting by name or value
v1.2.2.3
    - Peildatum aan currenstock toevoegen.
v1.2.2.2
    - fix for incorrect processDate format.
v1.2.2.1
    - Added processDate to delivering salesorders.
v1.2.0.1
    - Added Warehouse to order head
v1.2.0.0
    - Added Picture update for images
v1.1.5.1
    - KeepSameAsVisit added to Adress model
v1.1.5.0
    - Added GetCurrentStock
    - Added CreateStockCount
v1.1.4.0
    - Added ability to retrieve item by itemID
v1.1.3.9
    - Added InvoiceMethod to account
v1.1.3.8
    - Fixed a bug that made it impossible to get changed invoices.
v1.1.3.7
    - Added SalesPrice to Item model
v1.1.3.6
     - Added Quantity to revenue report.
v1.1.3.5
    - Added ItemAccounts
    - Added Conversion from company to Account
v1.1.2.3
    - Added Settings
    - SalesOrder Create Full added
    - SalesOrders are now segmented into their own set.
    - PurchaseOrders are now segmented into their own set.
v1.1.1.7
    - Added GetPriceListPrice function.
v1.1.1.6
    - Added PhoneNumber to Adress model in SalesOrder
v1.1.1.5
    - Added OurReference to salesorder header
v1.1.1.4
    - Added purchase orders
v1.1.1.3
      - Het is nu mogelijk om offertes op te halen op basis van aanmaakdatum.
      - fout bij updaten van general ledger verholpen
      v1.1.1.2
      - Het is nu mogelijk om de orderregels van een salesorder niet op te halen.
      v1.1.1.0
      - General Ledger Account toegevoegd met opties voor ophalen, ophalen met ID en ophalen met AccountNumber
      - Aanmaken en bijwerken van General Ledger Accounts toegevoegd
      v1.1.0.8
      - Added retrieval of invoices & salesorders based on creationdate.
v1.1.0.7
    - Added updating Debtor Notes.
v1.1.0.6
    - Bugfix for getting invoices by change date
v1.1.0.5
    - Added IsActive property to ItemCustomProperties

     - Bugfix with retrieval of invoices based on changedate
v1.1.0.3
    - Added ability to get relation by cmp_code
v1.1.0.2
    - Added ability to retrieve exact relation based on cmp_wwn
v1.1.0.1
    - Added the retrieval of invoices based on changedate.
v1.1.0.0
    - Added retrieval and postal of Requests towards Synergy.
    - Removed obsolete Report functions
v1.0.20.3
    - Leningverzoeken fix for incorrect usage of string array.
v1.0.20.2
    - Fixed a problem with retrieval of ArticleGroup revenue.
v1.0.20.0
    - Added remaining fields in SalesOrderVM

v1.0.19.5

v1.0.19.4
